chunks.original_text: 此为飞真之道，自别有经，事在《金华经》中。 丹田中有上元真一帝君、帝君之卿，合三人，共治丹田宫，三元真一之道是也。 此地真之要路，控乘龙车之经也。 天真多官位，乐欲为地真人，地真人隐遁於官位，不劳损於朝晏，故从容任适，随时而游，坐七舆以上造，步四炁於太无也。 至於天真、地真，虽差阶小异，俱一真矣。 地真人亦各安其所之，不愿复为云中官也。 玄丹宫有泥丸太一真君。 丹田后却入一寸，为流珠宫。 流珠真神，自别有经，司命之所行也。 其道妙大，发誓用珠帛结盟，乃能付之。 此经三百年一传，满五授止，不得复出。 此太极公卿司命之道也。 玄丹宫在丹田之上，正房一寸，紫房绿室，朱烟满内，其中有泥丸太一真君，治玄丹之宫。 太一真君貌如婴儿始生之状，坐在金床玉帐之中，着紫绣锦衣，腰带流火之铃。 流火之铃者，无质而赤光，动之声闻十万里，盖上清中黄太一真人之宝铃也。 左手把北斗七星之柄，右手把北辰之纲。 北辰者，北极不动之星，谓之为辰纲也。 正坐玄丹宫，向外，左右无侍者。 无侍者，所以名之谓太一真君也。 旦夕守诸三一讫，独后乃末存之。 末存之者，先造其轻，后行其重也。 夫头有九宫，请先说之。 两眉间上，其裹有黄阙紫户，绛台青房，共构立守寸之中左右耳。 守寸左面有绛台，右面有黄阙，其九宫真人出入，皆从黄关、绛台中间为道。 故以道之左右置台阙者，以伺非常之炁，伺迎真人之往来也。 紫户大神，名平静，字法王。 青房大神，名正心，字初方。 形并如婴孩，各服衣如其方房户之色，手执流金火铃。 守寸者，却入三分，名为守寸也。 暮卧及存思之时，先存二大神，彷佛存见，仍三呼其神名字，毕，微祝曰： 紫户青房，有二大神，手把流铃，身生风云，侠卫真道，不听外前，使我思感，通利灵关，出入利贞，上登九门，即见九真，太上之尊。 咒毕，乃可存思三一洞房九道诸要道也。 守寸二大神，唯听九宫中真官，在九宫内者，出入耳目，上帝信命。 及玉童灵真，往来诣帝轩，二大神听以进。 其余非真，此二大神皆不听进以前也，此中黄太一法度也。 於是赤子帝君，乃命两耳神娇女、云仪，使引进之，故人觉耳鸣者，外使入也。 云仪时扣磬钟，以闻九宫，使知外人来入，令警备也。 磬钟者，是令耳鸣之声音也。 其闻之者，错手掩耳，而咒曰： 赤子在宫，九真在房，请听神命，永察不祥，太一流火，以灭万殃。 咒毕，以手拍耳门二七遍，毕，当觉面热，即佳候也。 若觉头项颈间色色寒者，恶炁入也。 当急卧，临目内存玄丹宫太一真君，以流火之铃焕而掷之，令恶炁即出身，火光亦随之在后，炯炯然以照己一身，良久平复也。 耳中忽闻濑水声，雷电及鼓鸣者，是体中劳损，心藏极弊，不能味真注生，而淫放丧乱，使六府失摄，魂魄哀号，盖将结疾病，致死亡之兆矣。 是以泥丸纵法，九宫失常，悲扰翻错，鸣鼓乱行，将欲舍其居馆，以弃一身也。 闻之者，当精思念太一真君，反迷还专真心，若罪未深者，自听改也。 所以耳聋者，耳神亡之故也。 夫耳者，帝君之听门也； 目者，太一之日月也； 鼻者，三元之丘山也； 口者，绛宫之朱渊也；

This is the Way of Ascending as Perfected; it is expounded separately in its own scripture, detailed in the *Scripture of the Golden Flower*.

Within the Cinnabar Field reside the Upper Primordial Perfected Unity Lord Emperor and his ministers—three in all—who jointly govern the Palace of the Cinnabar Field. This is the Way of the Three Primordial Perfected Unity. Here lies the vital path of the earthly Perfected, the scripture for mounting the dragon chariot.

The celestial Perfected hold many ranks, yet some prefer to become earthly Perfected. The earthly Perfected conceal themselves within official positions, untroubled by the toils of courtly life, thus moving freely and at ease, wandering as they please. They may ride in carriages of the seventh rank or higher, or tread the four *qi* within the Great Void. Though the celestial and earthly Perfected differ slightly in rank, both are of the same Perfected essence. The earthly Perfected, content in their stations, no longer aspire to the offices of the cloud-borne realms.

Within the Mysterious Cinnabar Palace dwells the Mud-Pill Palace Supreme Unity Perfected Lord. One *cun* behind the Cinnabar Field lies the Flowing Pearl Palace. The Perfected Spirit of the Flowing Pearl has its own scripture and is governed by the Controller of Destiny. Its Way is profoundly subtle; to transmit it, one must swear an oath and seal the pact with silk and jade. This scripture is passed down once every three hundred years, and after five transmissions, it ceases to be further disseminated. This is the Way of the Supreme Polarity’s ministers and the Controller of Destiny.

The Mysterious Cinnabar Palace is situated one *cun* above the Cinnabar Field—a purple chamber within a verdant hall, filled with crimson mist. Within it resides the Mud-Pill Palace Supreme Unity Perfected Lord, who governs the Palace of the Mysterious Cinnabar. The Supreme Unity Perfected Lord appears as a newborn infant, seated upon a golden bed within a jade canopy, clad in a purple embroidered brocade robe, his waist adorned with flowing-fire bells. These flowing-fire bells, though without substance, emit a crimson radiance, and when shaken, their sound carries for a hundred thousand *li*—they are the treasured bells of the Central Yellow Supreme Unity Perfected of the Highest Clarity. In his left hand, he grasps the handle of the Northern Dipper’s seven stars; in his right, he holds the guiding cord of the Northern Apex. The Northern Apex is the unmoving star of the northern pole, hence called the guiding cord. Seated upright in the Mysterious Cinnabar Palace, facing outward, he has no attendants. The absence of attendants is why he is named the Supreme Unity Perfected Lord. At dawn and dusk, after guarding the Three Ones, one may then proceed to the final visualization. This final visualization begins with the subtle and progresses to the profound.

The head contains nine palaces; let us first describe them. Above the space between the eyebrows lies a yellow gate and a purple portal, a crimson terrace and a blue-green chamber, all constructed within a *cun*’s span to guard the left and right ears. To the left of this span stands the crimson terrace; to the right, the yellow gate. The Perfected of the nine palaces enter and exit through the path between the yellow gate and the crimson terrace. Thus, the terrace and gate are placed to the left and right of this path to observe extraordinary *qi* and to welcome the comings and goings of the Perfected. The great spirit of the purple portal is named Tranquil Serenity, styled Dharma King. The great spirit of the blue-green chamber is named Upright Heart, styled Primordial Square. Both resemble infants, each clad in robes matching the color of their respective chamber or portal, and each holds a flowing-gold fire bell.

The "guarding *cun*" refers to a point three *fen* inward, so named for its function. When retiring at night or engaging in visualization, first visualize these two great spirits, faintly perceiving their forms. Then, call their names three times, and softly recite this prayer:
*"Purple portal, blue-green chamber,
Two great spirits, hands holding flowing bells,
Bodies generating wind and cloud,
Flanking and guarding the true Way,
Barring all that lies without,
Grant that my thoughts and perceptions
Flow smoothly through the numinous gates,
Entering and exiting with purity,
Ascending through the nine portals,
To behold the nine Perfected,
The exalted of the Supreme."*
After the prayer, proceed to visualize the Three Ones, the nine paths of the Grotto Chamber, and other essential practices.

The two great spirits of the guarding *cun* heed only the Perfected officials within the nine palaces, allowing those within to pass through the eyes and ears at the Emperor’s command. They also permit the Jade Lads and Numinous Perfected to approach the imperial carriage. All others who are not Perfected are barred from entering by these two great spirits—this is the discipline of the Central Yellow Supreme Unity.

Thereupon, the Infant Emperor Lord commands the two ear spirits, Lovely Maiden and Cloud Ornament, to guide the visitor inward. Thus, when one perceives ringing in the ears, it signals an external presence seeking entry. Cloud Ornament strikes the chime and bell to alert the nine palaces, warning of an outsider’s approach. The chime and bell are the sounds that cause the ears to ring. Upon hearing this, one should cross their hands to cover the ears and recite:
*"The Infant dwells within the palace,
The nine Perfected abide in the chamber,
Heed the divine command,
Ever vigilant against misfortune,
The Supreme Unity’s flowing fire
Extinguishes ten thousand calamities."*
After the prayer, clap the ears thirty-four times. If warmth is felt in the face, it is an auspicious sign. If coldness is sensed in the head, neck, or nape, it indicates the entry of malign *qi*. One should immediately lie down, close the eyes, and visualize the Supreme Unity Perfected Lord of the Mud-Pill Palace, casting the flowing-fire bell to expel the malign *qi*. The fire’s radiance will follow behind, illuminating the entire body with a brilliant glow until equilibrium is restored.

If one suddenly hears the sound of rushing water, thunder, drums, or bells within the ears, it signifies bodily exhaustion, the heart’s storehouse severely debilitated, unable to savor the true and nourish life. Instead, indulgence and dissipation have caused the six palaces to lose control, and the hun and po to wail in sorrow—these are the omens of impending illness and death. Thus, the Mud-Pill Palace’s governance falters, the nine palaces lose their regularity, and sorrowful disturbances arise in chaotic succession. The drumming sounds signal the impending abandonment of one’s dwelling and the forsaking of the body. Upon hearing these, one must concentrate the mind and recall the Supreme Unity Perfected Lord, reversing confusion and restoring the true heart. If the transgression is not yet grave, one may still reform upon hearing this warning.

Deafness arises from the departure of the ear spirits. The ears are the listening gates of the Emperor Lord; the eyes are the sun and moon of the Supreme Unity; the nose is the hill and mountain of the Three Primordials; the mouth is the crimson abyss of the Crimson Palace.

chunks.original_text: 眉者，白元之华盖也； 发者，明堂之林精也； 舌者，元英之龙辕也； 齿者，胃宫之威刀也； 手者，胆神之外援也，足者，肾元之灵关也； 阴极者，洞房之真机也。 夫一体百神，各有所属，不可不察，不可不慎也。 耳中忽闻金声玉音者，真炁来入，道欲成也。 忽闻弦乐之声者，六丁玉女来卫子也，皆道欲成也。 当隐静专修所行，勤至之心愈弥於往也。 真人因是，遂有形见之渐矣。 自非尔师，且勿言於他人。 耳中忽闻箫角之音，吉象贵至也。 闻叫咉号呼之声者，凶象贱至也。 鼻闻臭炁者，必有淹秽之事，不净洁之□验也，故以臭炁示之矣。 急更沐浴烧香，扫除寝宇以答之，此是帝君将戒劝於人者也。 若闻香炁者，是神官灵人在子之侧，视子之状也。 其时当修诸好事，行德惠，拯穷困，布阴功，施慈爱，神官灵人还将告子於太上，道子之善否矣。 道之微妙，不可不察，皆此类象也。 闻香炁，自非尔师，勿告他人。 闻臭炁者，当告人，以明己之犯罪，触秽之无状矣。 若闻血气，及无故见聚血者，兵凶也。 急隐遁人间，守三元帝君求救，自藏斋三月，祸亦止也。 此皆帝君先告人之吉凶，以令惧戒其祸福耳。 夫见凶象，当行阴德，营惠救人，为人所不能为，行人所不能行者，始免乎必死之候也。 子其勖之，勿守常而已。 两眉间上，却入三分为守寸双田，却入一寸为明堂宫，却入二寸为洞房宫，却入三寸为丹田宫，却入四寸为流珠宫，却入五寸为玉帝宫，明堂上一寸为天庭宫，洞房上一寸为极真宫，丹田上一寸为玄丹宫，流珠宫上一寸为太皇宫。 凡一头中有九宫也。 其明堂、洞房、丹田、流珠四宫之经，皆神仙为真人之道，道传於世。 其玄丹宫经，亦真官司命之要言，四宫之领宗矣。 此一经须太极帝君告可与，乃与之也，亦时出授耳。 凡合五宫之道，行乎世上，有真名者，遭值之矣。 自非骨相挺命，不闻此言也。 又有玉帝宫，有玉清神母居之。 又有天庭宫，上清真女居之。 又有极真宫，太极帝妃居之。 又有太皇宫，太上君后居之。 此四宫，皆雌真一也，道高於雄真一也。 并有宝经，以传已成真人者，未得成真，非所闻也。 雌真一之要，亦自不授之矣。 太上所以出极八景，入骖琼轩，玉女三千，侍真扶辕，灵妃侠唱，神后执巾者，寔守雌一之道，用以高会玄晨也。 此太上之宗根，虚皇之所传也。 此四宫人皆有之，但不修此道者，宫中空耳。 夫不尽修於九宫者，宫中亦空耳，非但雌家四宫而已。 至於丹田宫中常有帝君，守寸常有大神，不复间，须修乃见在宫中耳。 修之者神仙，不修者以寿死矣。 雄雌一神者，男女并可兼修之，无不在也。 唯决精苦之至，乃获益矣。 守玄丹太一真君之道，暮夕静寝，去诸思念，坐卧任意，先存北极辰星紫炁，来下入己玄丹宫中，须臾满宫，溢出身外，使匝身，通洞内外，与紫炁合体。 毕，又存日来入玄丹宫中，日满宫内，在紫炁中央，望视如暗中视火珠之状。 毕，乃存上清中黄太一真君，从北极紫炁中来，下入玄丹宫日中坐。 君讳规英，字化玄，衣貌服色如上。 又存己一身，忽然升上，入玄丹宫日中，在太一真君前对坐，服色任意。 因心起再拜稽首，膝前问道，求神仙长生，随意言之。
chunks.translated_text:
The brows are the flowering canopy of the White Prime; the hair is the forest essence of the Bright Hall; the tongue is the dragon axle of the Primordial Flower; the teeth are the mighty blades of the Stomach Palace; the hands are the external aids of the Gallbladder Spirit; the feet are the numinous gates of the Kidney Prime; the utmost yin is the true mechanism of the Grotto Chamber.

Within a single body, the hundred spirits each have their affiliations—these must not go unexamined, nor treated with carelessness. Should one suddenly hear golden tones and jade sounds within the ears, it is the true *qi* entering, signaling the Dao’s imminent fruition. If one hears the strains of stringed music, it is the Six *Ding* Jade Maidens come to guard you—this too portends the Dao’s fulfillment. One must then withdraw into seclusion, focusing single-mindedly on cultivation, with diligence surpassing all past efforts. Through this, the Perfected One gradually assumes visible form. Unless your master instructs otherwise, do not speak of this to others.

If one suddenly hears the notes of flutes and horns within the ears, it is an auspicious omen of noble fortune arriving. But if one hears wailing, howling, or clamorous cries, it is an inauspicious omen of base fortune approaching. Should one detect foul *qi* through the nose, it foretells encounters with filth and impurity—an ill omen indeed, hence the warning through foul *qi*. One must immediately bathe, burn incense, and sweep clean the dwelling to respond, for this is the Emperor Lord’s way of admonishing mortals. If one perceives fragrant *qi*, it signifies that divine officials and numinous beings are at your side, observing your conduct. At such times, one should perform good deeds, practice virtue and kindness, relieve the destitute, accumulate hidden merit, and extend compassion. The divine officials and numinous beings will then report your deeds to the Supreme, revealing your goodness or failings. The subtleties of the Dao must not go unheeded—all such signs follow this pattern. Unless your master instructs otherwise, do not disclose the perception of fragrant *qi* to others. If one detects foul *qi*, however, one should inform others, making clear one’s transgressions and the uncleanliness of one’s misdeeds.

Should one smell the scent of blood or unexpectedly encounter pools of blood, it portends military strife. One must swiftly withdraw from the mortal realm, entreat the Three Primordial Emperor Lords for deliverance, and observe a three-month retreat in seclusion—thus may the calamity be averted. These are all ways the Emperor Lord forewarns mortals of fortune and misfortune, urging vigilance against disaster. Upon witnessing inauspicious omens, one must practice hidden virtue, extend kindness to save others, do what others cannot, and walk paths others dare not—only then may one escape the fate of certain death. Take heed and do not cling to the ordinary.

Three *fen* inward from the space between the brows lies the *Shuangtian* of the Guard Inch; one *cun* inward lies the Bright Hall Palace; two *cun* inward lies the Grotto Chamber Palace; three *cun* inward lies the Cinnabar Field Palace; four *cun* inward lies the Flowing Pearl Palace; five *cun* inward lies the Jade Emperor Palace. One *cun* above the Bright Hall lies the Heavenly Court Palace; one *cun* above the Grotto Chamber lies the Utmost Perfection Palace; one *cun* above the Cinnabar Field lies the Mysterious Cinnabar Palace; one *cun* above the Flowing Pearl Palace lies the Supreme August Palace. In all, the head contains nine palaces.

The scriptures of the Bright Hall, Grotto Chamber, Cinnabar Field, and Flowing Pearl Palaces are the Dao of immortality for Perfected Ones, transmitted through the ages. The scripture of the Mysterious Cinnabar Palace contains the essential teachings of the True Officials and Controller of Destinies, presiding over the four palaces. This scripture may only be conferred when the Supreme Ultimate Emperor Lord grants permission—it is transmitted only at the proper time. Those who unite the Dao of the five palaces and practice it in the world, bearing a true name, shall encounter it. Without the destined bone and fate, one will never hear of these teachings.

The Jade Emperor Palace is inhabited by the Jade Clarity Divine Mother; the Heavenly Court Palace by the Upper Clarity Perfected Maiden; the Utmost Perfection Palace by the Supreme Ultimate Imperial Consort; the Supreme August Palace by the Supreme Lord’s Queen. These four palaces are the abodes of the Feminine True Unity, whose Dao surpasses that of the Masculine True Unity. Each possesses precious scriptures, transmitted only to those who have already attained Perfection. Those who have not yet achieved Perfection shall not hear of them. The essentials of the Feminine True Unity are likewise not conferred lightly.

Thus, the Supreme ascends the Eight Radiant Sceneries, enters the jade-carriage, attended by three thousand jade maidens who support the axle, with spirit consorts singing in harmony and divine attendants bearing towels—all uphold the Dao of the Feminine Unity, employing it to convene in the Mysterious Dawn. This is the root lineage of the Supreme, transmitted by the Sovereign of the Void. These four palaces exist within all people, but for those who do not cultivate this Dao, the palaces remain empty. Those who do not fully cultivate the nine palaces will likewise find their palaces empty—not merely the four palaces of the Feminine.

Within the Cinnabar Field Palace, the Emperor Lord is ever present; within the Guard Inch, great spirits reside without cease. Yet one must cultivate to perceive them within the palaces. Those who cultivate shall become immortals; those who do not shall die of old age.

The deities of the Masculine and Feminine Unity may be cultivated by both men and women—none are excluded. Only through utmost resolve and bitter toil may one reap the benefits.

In practicing the Dao of the Supreme Unity Perfected Lord of the Mysterious Cinnabar, at dusk or in quiet repose, dispel all distracting thoughts. Whether sitting or lying down, first visualize the purple *qi* of the Northern Culmen star descending into your Mysterious Cinnabar Palace. Soon, the palace fills, and the *qi* overflows beyond the body, enveloping it entirely, penetrating within and without, merging with the purple *qi*. Then, visualize the sun entering the Mysterious Cinnabar Palace, filling it until it rests at the center of the purple *qi*, appearing like a fire pearl seen in darkness.

Next, visualize the Upper Clarity Central Yellow Supreme Unity Perfected Lord descending from the Northern Culmen’s purple *qi* into the sun within the Mysterious Cinnabar Palace and taking his seat. His name is *Guīyīng*, his style *Huàxuán*, and his attire and countenance are as described above. Then visualize your own body suddenly ascending into the sun within the Mysterious Cinnabar Palace, sitting opposite the Supreme Unity Perfected Lord, dressed as you wish. With reverence, bow twice, press your forehead to the ground, and kneel to inquire of the Dao, seeking immortality and longevity, speaking as your heart desires.

chunks.original_text: 因乃存吞紫炁三十过，毕，咽唾三十过，毕，又存北斗七星内，有一赤炁大如弦，径下直入玄丹宫，於是太一君及己，俱乘日入行赤炁道中，直上诣北斗魁中，寝息良久。 自因此寝也，亦即有真应。 十四年行之，则与太一同游，俱到七元之纲也。 十八年，诣上清宫，受书佩符后，役使玉童、玉女各十八人。 一夕一存之，唯数而已，勿令脱夕。 亦可专修此道，不必须守三一也。 兼之益精，至感速耳。 月一日、三日、七日、十一日、十五日夜半之时，存玄丹宫中太一真君，正坐向外，口吐青炁，下入我口中，我随咽之，凡五十过，毕，乃咽唾五十过，毕，微咒曰： 太一真黄，中黄紫君，厥讳规英，字曰化玄，金床玉帐，紫绣锦裙，腰带火铃，斩邪灭奸，手把星精，项生日真，正坐吐炁，使我咽吞，与我共语，同宴玄丹，练濯七魄，和柔三魂，神灵奉卫，使我飞仙，五藏自生，还白童颜，受书上清，司命帝官，所愿所欲，百福维新。 又存己上入宫中，在太一前寝息也。 因以取眠，亦当梦感妙应矣。 日为此，而数积，有相见之阶渐。 四宫雌真一内神宝名玉诀 凡学上真之道，而不知雌真一之内名，亦万不得仙也。 学者受师口诀，然后奉行。 每以正旦、月朔、太岁本生之日，入室东向，思存玉清神母，姓廉名，字荒彦，长九寸九分，着玄黄素灵之绶，头戴七称珠玉之髻，冠无极进贤之冠，居无上之上，太极朱宫中，七宝之府五灵乡玄元里，下治兆身玉帝宫中。 上清真女，姓厥名回，字弼，长六寸六分，着青宝神光锦绣霜罗九色之绶，头戴玉宝飞云之髻，冠玄黄进贤之冠，居无上之上，太上昆仑太幽宫中，明堂府九光乡大化里，下治兆身天庭宫中。 太极帝妃，姓玄名虚生，字伯无，长七寸七分，着玄罗流光五色凤文绶，头戴七宝玄云之髻，冠无极进贤之冠，居元景之上，太清极玄宫中，玉房府三丹乡丹元里，下治兆身极真宫中。 太上君后，姓迁名含孩，字合延生，长三寸三分，着七宝飞精玄光云锦霜罗九色之绶，头戴九玄玉精颓云之髻，冠玄黄无极三宝玉冠，居太清九玄之上，洞元极真宫中，丹精府云光乡玄玄里，下治兆身太皇宫中。 行玄丹之道，守三一之诀，当常守四宫雌真一之神，衣服、形影、名讳、乡居所在。 此宝经之上篇，以传见成真人者，始学不得参闻。 其要素灵所秘，不行於世。 凡受上真之法，三宝神经，虽通灵究幽，不知雌真一之法，亦万无成矣。 故太上标其重禁，格於轻泄，不载於纸墨。 有者宜各审实内心，然后受焉。 每以正旦、月朔，及太岁本生之日，沐浴清斋，烧香入室，东向存思四宫雌真一之神，乡居、姓名、服色、长短，如上法。 毕，当叩齿三十六通，咒曰： 太真阴神，号曰女灵，变景九玄，乘真隐冥，日吉天朗，告斋上清，心念目瞩，洞鉴神形，还守宫宅，玉华芳盈，五色变化，流黄紫青，运致飞霞，上造帝庭。 毕，咽炁三十六过止。 如此毕九年，面生玉华，金真映光，神见躯形，与兆共言。 子既见神，心知而已，慎勿妄传。 此四宫雌真一之神，是天元始生之阴官，受号帝妃也。 其元炁未立，五正未闻，光景未通，无极虚无，无上无下，无外无内，无左无右，无前无后，太上之元精，玄始之妙真，虚极之先，结炁而凝，混化万物，天地得存，皆由於四真也。
chunks.translated_text:
Then visualize swallowing the purple *qi* thirty times. When finished, swallow saliva thirty times. Next, visualize within the Northern Dipper’s seven stars a crimson *qi* as thick as a bowstring descending straight into the Mysterious Cinnabar Palace. Thereupon, the Supreme Unity Perfected Lord and yourself together mount the sun and travel within the crimson *qi*’s path, ascending directly to the Dipper’s *Kui* and resting for a long while. From this meditation comes true response. After fourteen years of practice, you will wander together with the Supreme Unity, both reaching the Pivot of the Seven Origins. After eighteen years, you will ascend to the Upper Clarity Palace to receive scriptures and wear talismans, thereafter commanding eighteen jade lads and eighteen jade maidens. Perform this visualization once each night, keeping count without fail. This practice may also be pursued exclusively, without needing to maintain the Three Ones. Combined with it, essence is enhanced, and resonance comes swiftly.

On the first, third, seventh, eleventh, and fifteenth days of the month at midnight, visualize the Supreme Unity Perfected Lord within the Mysterious Cinnabar Palace, seated facing outward, exhaling azure *qi* that enters your mouth. You then swallow it fifty times. When finished, swallow saliva fifty times, then softly recite the incantation:

*"Supreme Unity, True Yellow,
Central Yellow Purple Lord,
whose name is* Guīyīng*,*
*whose style is* Huàxuán*,*
*seated on a golden bed within a jade canopy,*
*clad in purple embroidered brocade skirts,*
*waist hung with fire bells to slay demons and vanquish treachery,*
*hand grasping stellar essence,*
*neck bearing the sun’s true radiance,*
*now seated exhaling* qi*,*
*causing me to swallow it.*
*Speak with me,*
*feast together in the Mysterious Cinnabar,*
*temper and bathe the seven po,*
*harmonize and soften the three hun.*
*May divine spirits attend and guard,*
*enabling me to ascend as an immortal.*
*May the five viscera regenerate,*
*restoring the white countenance of youth.*
*Receive scriptures in the Upper Clarity,*
*serve as an imperial official of destiny.*
*May all wishes and desires*
*bring forth a hundredfold renewal of blessings."*

Then visualize yourself ascending into the palace to rest before the Supreme Unity. As you fall asleep, wondrous responses will manifest in dreams. By accumulating such practice daily, the steps toward mutual encounter gradually appear.

**The Four Palaces’ Feminine True Unity: Inner Spirit Treasures and Jade Instructions**

For those who study the Dao of the Upper Perfected yet do not know the inner names of the Feminine True Unity, attaining immortality is utterly impossible. Disciples must first receive their master’s oral instructions before proceeding.

On New Year’s Day, the first day of each month, and the day of the Year-Star’s birth, enter the chamber facing east and visualize the Jade Clarity Divine Mother: her surname is *Lián*, her given name *Yù*, her style *Huāngyàn*. She is nine inches and nine parts in height, wearing a sash of dark yellow and plain numinous silk. Her hair is bound in a topknot of seven strands of pearls and jade, crowned with the *Wújí Jìnxián* coronet. She dwells in the Supreme Above, within the Crimson Palace of the Great Ultimate, the Seven Treasures’ Repository of the Five Numinous Realms in the Dark Origin Precinct. Below, she governs the Jade Emperor’s Palace within your body.

The Upper Clarity Perfected Maiden: her surname is *Jué*, her given name *Huí*, her style *Bìyù*. She is six inches and six parts in height, wearing a sash of azure treasure, divine radiance, brocade, frost-silk, and nine-colored hues. Her hair is bound in a topknot of jade and flying clouds, crowned with the *Xuánhuáng Jìnxián* coronet. She dwells in the Supreme Above, within the Great Darkness Palace of the Supreme Kunlun, the Bright Hall Repository of the Nine Radiant Realms in the Great Transformation Precinct. Below, she governs the Heavenly Court Palace within your body.

The Great Ultimate’s Imperial Consort: her surname is *Xuán*, her given name *Xūshēng*, her style *Bówú*. She is seven inches and seven parts in height, wearing a sash of dark silk, flowing radiance, and five-colored phoenix patterns. Her hair is bound in a topknot of seven treasures and dark clouds, crowned with the *Wújí Jìnxián* coronet. She dwells above the Primordial Scenery, within the Supreme Clarity’s Ultimate Dark Palace, the Jade Chamber Repository of the Three Elixirs’ Realm in the Cinnabar Origin Precinct. Below, she governs the Ultimate Perfection Palace within your body.

The Supreme Lord’s Queen: her surname is *Qiān*, her given name *Hánhái*, her style *Héyánshēng*. She is three inches and three parts in height, wearing a sash of seven treasures, flying essence, dark radiance, cloud brocade, frost-silk, and nine-colored hues. Her hair is bound in a topknot of nine dark jade essences and tumbling clouds, crowned with the *Xuánhuáng Wújí* Triple Treasure Jade Coronet. She dwells above the Nine Darks of the Supreme Clarity, within the Cavernous Origin’s Ultimate Perfection Palace, the Cinnabar Essence Repository of the Cloud Radiance Realm in the Darkest Dark Precinct. Below, she governs the Grand August Palace within your body.

To practice the Mysterious Cinnabar’s Dao and maintain the Three Ones’ instructions, one must constantly guard the spirits of the Four Palaces’ Feminine True Unity, their attire, forms, names, and dwelling places. This is the upper chapter of the precious scripture, transmitted only to those who have attained Perfected status. Beginners must not presume to inquire into it. Its essential numinous mysteries are closely guarded and not circulated in the world.

For those who receive the Upper Perfected’s methods and the Three Treasures’ divine scriptures, though they may penetrate the numinous and fathom the obscure, without knowing the Feminine True Unity’s method, they will never succeed. Thus, the Supreme has marked it as a weighty prohibition, strictly forbidding careless disclosure, and has not recorded it in writing. Those who possess it must first examine their hearts sincerely before receiving it.

On New Year’s Day, the first day of each month, and the day of the Year-Star’s birth, bathe, purify yourself, and fast. Then burn incense, enter the chamber, face east, and visualize the Four Palaces’ Feminine True Unity spirits—their dwelling places, names, attire, and heights—as described above. When finished, knock the teeth thirty-six times and recite the incantation:

*"Supreme Perfected Yin Spirit,*
*styled the Feminine Numinous,*
*transforming into nine darks’ radiance,*
*riding the true to conceal in obscurity.*
*On an auspicious day when heaven is bright,*
*declare the fast to the Upper Clarity.*
*Heart’s thoughts and eyes’ gaze*
*penetrate and perceive the divine form.*
*Return to guard the palace and dwelling,*
*jade splendor and fragrance filling it.*
*Five colors transform,*
*flowing yellow, purple, and azure.*
*Conveying flying clouds,*
*ascend to the imperial court."*

When finished, swallow *qi* thirty-six times and stop. After nine years of such practice, your face will bloom with jade splendor, golden perfection will reflect its light, and spirits will appear in bodily form to speak with you. Once you have seen the spirits, keep it in your heart alone; be cautious never to transmit it carelessly.

These Four Palaces’ Feminine True Unity spirits are the yin officials of the Heavenly Origin’s primordial generation, bearing the titles of Imperial Consorts. Before the primordial *qi* was established, before the Five Norms were known, before light and radiance were communicated, in the boundless void—without above or below, without exterior or interior, without left or right, without front or back—the Supreme’s primordial essence, the Dark Beginning’s wondrous perfection, the prior state of the ultimate void, condensed *qi* and congealed. Through their transformation, the myriad things were blended, and heaven and earth were preserved—all through the Four Perfected.

chunks.original_text: 能有至心存思者，千龄不知老，九天之中，万神同寿也。 太上太极帝君真符宝章 太微天帝君受传金阙帝君。 此太极帝君真符，上元六符，中元五符，下元五符。 太上召三一守形之法，立春、春分、立夏、夏至、立秋、秋分、立冬、冬至始日，朱书，平旦向王，服一符，以次十六日，竟服十六符也。 后节复如先，从上起服也。 服符悉向王再拜，咒曰： 上元一真，守固泥丸，中元一真，安神绛宫，下元一真，卫我命门，三元齐景，保命长存，招灵致炁，坐降自然，变形练髓，骨化成仙，毛羽飞罗，腾翔帝晨。 又朱书符，盛以锦囊，佩於头上，勿履洿秽。 服符五年，得与真人相见，九年通灵彻视，坐在立亡，役使六甲，天给玉童玉女各十二人，乘云驾龙，游宴玉宫。 此太上宝章，传太帝君，太帝君传天帝君，天帝君传太微天帝君，太微天帝君传金阙帝君，金阙帝君传东海青童，以封掌名山，召制五岳。 以朱书素，佩之左肘，勿经洿秽。 佩之八年，三一俱见矣。

**The Supreme’s True Talisman and Treasured Writ of the Great Ultimate Imperial Lord**
Transmitted from the Golden Watchtower Imperial Lord to the Heavenly Emperor of the Grand Tenuity.

This True Talisman of the Great Ultimate Imperial Lord comprises the Six Talismans of the Upper Origin, the Five Talismans of the Middle Origin, and the Five Talismans of the Lower Origin.

The Supreme’s method of summoning the Three Ones to guard the form: on the first days of *Lichun*, *Chunfen*, *Lixia*, *Xiazhi*, *Liqiu*, *Qiufen*, *Lidong*, and *Dongzhi*, inscribe the talismans in cinnabar. At dawn, face the *wang* direction and ingest one talisman, proceeding in sequence over sixteen days until all sixteen talismans are consumed. Thereafter, repeat the cycle as before, beginning anew from the first.

When ingesting the talismans, always face the *wang* direction, bow twice, and recite the incantation:
*"The Upper Origin’s One True guards firm the Muddy Pellet,
The Middle Origin’s One True settles the spirit in the Crimson Palace,
The Lower Origin’s One True shields my Gate of Life.
The Three Origins unite in radiance, preserving life eternally.
They summon the numinous and draw forth *qi*, seated in natural descent.
Transforming the form and refining the marrow, bones transmute into immortality.
Feathered and winged, I soar through the imperial dawn."*

Inscribe the talisman again in cinnabar, enclose it in a brocade pouch, and wear it upon the head, avoiding all defilement. After five years of talisman ingestion, one may meet with Perfected Persons; after nine years, achieve spiritual communion and penetrating vision, sitting in life and vanishing in death. Command the Six *Jia* spirits, and heaven shall grant twelve Jade Lads and twelve Jade Maidens. Ride clouds and mount dragons to wander and feast in the Jade Palaces.

This Treasured Writ of the Supreme was transmitted from the Supreme Imperial Lord to the Grand Imperial Lord, from the Grand Imperial Lord to the Heavenly Emperor, from the Heavenly Emperor to the Heavenly Emperor of the Grand Tenuity, from the Heavenly Emperor of the Grand Tenuity to the Golden Watchtower Imperial Lord, and from the Golden Watchtower Imperial Lord to the Azure Lad of the Eastern Sea, who sealed it to govern the sacred mountains and summon and command the Five Peaks.

Inscribe it in cinnabar upon silk and wear it on the left elbow, avoiding all defilement. After eight years of wearing it, the Three Ones shall all manifest.

chunks.original_text: 正月旦，青笔书一符，北向再拜，吞之。 三一相见之后，以金为质，长九寸，广四寸，厚三分，刻而书之，以封山川之邪神，掌五岳之真精也。 临时三元真一君，当悟兆施用节度，神真之道，服符北向，叩齿三十六通，因仰咒曰： 三真守房，元老固精，天地混合，二炁交并，帝君威策，命童摄灵，封山召海，摧灭群生，促诣北帝，条列魔名，检统无横，速还鬼营。 毕，佩符封山召海，制御万灵，役使禽兽，伏诸天兵，游行五岳。 临时皆当先叩左齿三十六通，存七星覆兆身头上，口吐赤炁，冠满一域，四面洞匝，焚烧内外，无复孑遗。 见己身在火中央，须臾，有五岳神官，及山野之兽，来朝己身，便咒曰： 元始出令，宣告万灵，太真帝章，与炁俱生，自下总统，悉归上清，若有不反，收摄真形，封山召海，应令摧倾，速来自伏，不得稽停，急如正律，无令越冥。 毕，咽三十六炁止。 太上大洞守一内经法 太上曰：真人所以贵一为真一者，上一而已矣。 一之所契，太无感化，一之变通，天地冥合。 是以上一为一身之天帝，中一为绛宫之丹皇，下一为黄庭之元王，而三一之真，并监统身中二十四炁，炁以受生，生立一身，上应太微二十四真，真炁徊和，品物成形，玄神混分，紫房杳冥。 夫炁者，结灵烟而成神也。 神者，托三一以自王也。 变化者，三一之所造，得化者皆由神以自隐，混黄相成，得玄之极。 三一元君，各有真炁，真炁结成，自为千乘万骑，云车羽盖，常以内入紫宫，以登玉清，列箓元图，伐胞保胎。 三一养身，得为真人，飞行九霄，受事高上。 所以一之所济者，乃生乎天地也。 非但飞行蠕动，小事而已。 子若能守之弥固，则精应感畅。 精应感畅，则三元可见。 三元见，则白炁郁变。 白炁郁变，则混分自生。 混分自生，即千乘万骑，忽焉至矣。 於是羽盖可御，云軿可乘，尔乃白日升天，上造太微，寔三一之玄功，精感之所会也。 太微天中有二十四炁，混黄杂聚，结炁变化，有时忽尔而分，觉然而生也。 化炁中生有二十四真人，结虚生成，不由胞胎，皆三一帝皇之炁所致，分道变化，托玄立景矣。 既能守身中三一，则太微天中三元帝皇之真君，而降见於外，亦与子面言也。 身中复有二十四真人，亦体中玄炁精灵所结而造致，分化而造万也。 若云軿既致，合炁晨景，以登太微。 太微二十四真人，俱与身中神明，合宴於混黄之中，共景分於紫房之内，托形炁於千涂，回老艾以反婴，改死籍於北酆，受长存乎帝乡，出入玉清，寝止太微。 又当兼行帝一、太一五神，及三五七九之事，兼行之者，而一神之感致易也。 紫房须守一为根本，守一须紫房为华盖，故三一三素相须也，而紫房六合相待也。 虽其居不同，而致一之用俱济也。 子善思而存之，则三一之事毕也。 若单得受一道者，则三元不备，但注心於一，亦可长生不死，得入太清而己，不得游景太微之天，北登上清之宫也。 上一真帝之极也，中一真皇之至也，下一真王之妙也。 天皇得极，故上成皇极。 地皇得至，故上成正一。 人皇得妙，故上成众妙之君。 三皇体真以守一，故一无藏形。 仙人寻真以求一，故三一俱明。 一无藏形，其真极也。

On the first day of the first month, inscribe a talisman with a green brush, face north, bow twice, and swallow it. After the Three Ones manifest, use gold as the base—nine inches in length, four inches in width, and three *fen* in thickness—carve and inscribe it to seal the malevolent spirits of mountains and rivers and command the true essences of the Five Peaks.

When the time comes, the Three Primordial True One Lords shall enlighten the practitioner on the proper application and discipline. In the Dao of divine transcendents, face north while wearing the talisman, knock the teeth thirty-six times, and then recite the incantation while looking upward:

*"Three Perfected guard the chamber,
Primordial Elders consolidate essence.
Heaven and earth merge as one,
The two qi intermingle.
The Imperial Lord wields his authority,
Commands the lads to seize spirits.
Seal the mountains and summon the seas,
Crush and annihilate the multitudes.
Hasten them to the Northern Emperor,
List the demons’ names in order.
Supervise and restrain without excess,
Swiftly return to the ghostly encampment."*

Once completed, wear the talisman to seal mountains and summon seas, control the myriad spirits, command birds and beasts, subdue the celestial soldiers of all heavens, and wander through the Five Peaks. At such times, first knock the left teeth thirty-six times, visualize the Seven Stars covering one’s head, and exhale red *qi* to crown the entire domain, enveloping all four directions in a blazing inferno that burns within and without, leaving no remnant. See oneself standing at the center of the fire, and in an instant, the divine officials of the Five Peaks and the beasts of mountains and wilds shall come to pay homage. Then recite the incantation:

*"The Primordial Beginning issues the decree,
Proclaiming to the myriad spirits.
The Supreme Perfected Imperial Writ,
Born with the qi,
From below governs all,
All return to the Supreme Clarity.
Should any disobey,
Their true forms shall be seized.
Seal the mountains and summon the seas,
Respond to the command and collapse.
Hasten to submit,
Delay not.
Swift as the true law,
Transgress not the dark bounds."*

Afterward, swallow thirty-six breaths to conclude.

---

**The Supreme Scripture of the Great Cavern on Guarding the One and the Inner Canon**

The Supreme Lord said: The reason the Perfected value the One as the True One is that the Upper One alone suffices. What the One accords with is the responsive transformation of the Great Void; the One’s adaptability is the mysterious union of heaven and earth. Thus, the Upper One is the Celestial Emperor of the body, the Middle One is the Cinnabar Sovereign of the Crimson Palace, and the Lower One is the Primordial King of the Yellow Court. The Three Ones’ true essence jointly oversees the twenty-four *qi* within the body. *Qi* receives life, and life establishes the body, corresponding above to the Twenty-Four Perfected of the Grand Tenuity. The Perfected *qi* harmonizes and circulates, giving form to all things. The mysterious spirits intermingle and divide, dwelling in the profound obscurity of the Purple Chamber.

*Qi* coalesces the numinous mist to form spirits. Spirits rely on the Three Ones to rule themselves. Transformations are the creations of the Three Ones; those who attain transformation do so through spirits that conceal themselves. The blending of the Yellow and the Mysterious achieves the ultimate profundity. The Three One Lords each possess true *qi*; when the true *qi* coalesces, it naturally forms a thousand chariots and ten thousand riders, cloud carriages and feathered canopies, which constantly enter the Purple Palace to ascend the Jade Clarity, inscribe the primordial registers, and protect the embryo and womb.

By nurturing the body with the Three Ones, one becomes a Perfected, soaring through the Nine Heavens and serving the Most High. Thus, what the One accomplishes is the generation of heaven and earth—far more than mere flight or the movements of creeping creatures. If you can guard it with unwavering firmness, then essence and response shall flow unimpeded. When essence and response flow unimpeded, the Three Primordials become visible. When the Three Primordials appear, white *qi* surges and transforms. When white *qi* surges and transforms, the Mysterious Division naturally arises. When the Mysterious Division naturally arises, the thousand chariots and ten thousand riders suddenly arrive. Then, feathered canopies may be ridden, cloud carriages may be mounted, and you shall ascend to heaven in broad daylight, reaching the Grand Tenuity—truly the mysterious achievement of the Three Ones and the convergence of essence and response.

Within the Grand Tenuity Heaven are twenty-four *qi*, blending the Yellow and intermingling, coalescing *qi* to transform. At times, they suddenly divide and awaken to life. From the transforming *qi* arise the Twenty-Four Perfected, formed from emptiness and completed without womb or embryo, all born of the *qi* of the Three One Imperial Sovereigns, branching into the Dao and transforming, entrusting the Mysterious to establish their radiance.

If you can guard the Three Ones within the body, then the True Lords of the Three Primordials of the Grand Tenuity Heaven shall descend and appear externally, even speaking with you face to face. Within the body are also Twenty-Four Perfected, likewise formed from the body’s mysterious *qi* and spiritual essence, dividing and transforming to create the myriad beings. When the cloud carriage arrives and the *qi* merges with the morning radiance, you ascend to the Grand Tenuity. The Twenty-Four Perfected of the Grand Tenuity, together with the spirits within the body, feast in the blending of the Yellow, sharing their radiance within the Purple Chamber, entrusting their forms and *qi* to the thousand paths, reversing old age to return to infancy, altering the register of death in the Northern Feng, receiving eternal existence in the Imperial Homeland, entering and exiting the Jade Clarity, and resting in the Grand Tenuity.

You should also concurrently practice the affairs of the Imperial One, the Supreme One, the Five Spirits, and the Three, Five, Seven, and Nine. Practicing them together makes the resonance of the One Spirit easier to attain. The Purple Chamber must take guarding the One as its root, and guarding the One must take the Purple Chamber as its canopy. Thus, the Three Ones and the Three Pristine Ones rely on each other, as do the Six Harmonies of the Purple Chamber. Though their dwellings differ, their application of the One achieves the same efficacy. If you diligently contemplate and preserve this, the affairs of the Three Ones shall be complete.

If one only receives the Dao of the One, the Three Primordials will not be complete. By focusing the mind solely on the One, one may still attain longevity and immortality, entering the Grand Clarity, but will not be able to wander the radiant heavens of the Grand Tenuity or ascend the palaces of the Supreme Clarity in the north. The Upper One is the ultimate of the True Emperor, the Middle One is the perfection of the True Sovereign, and the Lower One is the subtlety of the True King. The Celestial Sovereign attains the ultimate and thus ascends to the Imperial Ultimate. The Earthly Sovereign attains perfection and thus ascends to the Orthodox One. The Human Sovereign attains subtlety and thus ascends to the Lord of Myriad Subtleties. The Three Sovereigns embody the True to guard the One, so the One has no hidden form. The immortals seek the True to pursue the One, so the Three Ones are all illuminated. The One having no hidden form is the ultimate of the True.

chunks.original_text: 三一俱明，得一而已。 其真既极，三一既明，得一而生也。 夫真守一者，当令心寂神凝，体专求感，所以百念不寻，精意不散，三月内视，注心一神，则神光化生，缠绵五藏。 所以注向不散，专炁致和，由固之至也，得一之效也。 若华伪潸兴，竞心乱生，故一不卒感，神不即应，非不欲往，存之者不专，思之者不审，故起积年之功，罔有彷佛也。 若能心济远感，专心无他，亦不必三月之精思，与一混合也。 太上告曰：三元者，九天之玉真，上真之正道也。 胎根之所生，六合之所存，故正一大道，以出真帝，正道玄真，以生大神，离合五老，万化忽成，三元解变，则一之所生也。 故变炁布结，神得以灵，众真归一，而玄功成焉。 此正道之祖宗，元炁之根始也。 散之於无，则白炁杳合，养之於形，则长生永久。 夫三一之法，观道备於三元，其道奇妙，总合灵篇，天人仙皇，握宝神经。 第一之奇，《大洞真经三十九章》； 第二奇文，雌一合变，号《大有妙经》； 第三玉诀，洞真玄经，三五七九，号《太上素灵》。 是故上一帝君宝《大洞真经》，中一丹皇宝《雌一妙经》，下一元王秘《素灵洞玄大有妙经》。 此三五之号，真道之至精，三一之极章，并玉清之禁诀，高上之秘篇。 兆守三一，得吾三经，即能乘云上升太清，洞观无穷，游宴紫庭，微哉探矣，难可文宣。 守一所生，三一见矣，子既得一，自得此经。 守三一之法，皇天上清金阙帝君真书之首篇，高上之玉道，神仙之津涂，众真之妙诀。 子能守一，一亦守子； 子能见一，一亦见子。 一须身而立，身须一而行。 子身进退，千端万事，常当念一，饮食念一，欣乐念一，哀戚念一，疾病念一，危难念一，履水火念一，有急念一，举止瞩目，念亦多矣。 思念必专，不专无冀矣。 患人有志不固，固不能久，知一名字而不能守，守不能坚志，志不能苦。 思念无极，多有本心。 或知一之道，不能常守，故三一去，则正炁离。 夫失正炁者，则故炁前，故炁前则死日近也。 俗人学道，多寻浮华，不以真一为贵，初虽有其志，后必变败，皆由用志不一，邪炁来入故也。 守一之戒，戒於不专，专复不久，久不见精，精不能固，固而不常，则三一去矣，身为空宅耳。 空宅无主，其祸安久。 太上告曰：炁结为精，精感为神，神化为婴儿，婴儿上为真人，真人升为赤子，此真一也。 太上告曰：天有三光，谓日月星也，亦为三精，是用长生。 人有三宝，三丹田也，亦为三真，是用永存。 灵宝经曰：天精地真，三宝常存。 此之谓也。 太上告曰：两眉间，上丹田也。 心绛宫，中丹田也。 脐下三寸，下丹田也。 合三丹田也。 赤子居上丹田宫，真人居中丹田宫，婴儿居下丹田宫。 两眉间上，却入一寸为明堂，却入二寸为洞房，却入三寸为丹田泥丸宫。 却入者，从面却往就顶后之背也。 丹田泥丸宫，正四方面各一寸。 存紫炁冲天，紫炁中有日象，圆九寸，外映照九万里，我形变化，大小暂见，倏欻忘身，亦在意存之，上元赤子，居在泥丸宫中，华盖之下。 泥丸天帝上一赤子，讳玄凝天，字三元先，一名伯无上，一名伯史华，位为泥丸天帝君，治在上一宫。 其右有帝卿一人，坐相对，是我齿、舌、脑之精神，升化而忽生也。
chunks.translated_text:
The illumination of the Three Ones is but the attainment of the One. When the True has reached its ultimate and the Three Ones are illuminated, life is born through the attainment of the One. Those who truly guard the One must still the heart and congeal the spirit, concentrating the body to seek resonance. Thus, a hundred thoughts do not arise, essence and intent do not scatter. For three months, turn the gaze inward and focus the heart on the One Spirit—then the spirit’s radiance transforms and generates, entwining the five viscera. This is why the focus does not scatter, the qi is harmonized through concentration, and the utmost solidity is achieved—this is the effect of attaining the One. If false thoughts arise like blossoms and competing desires disturb the heart, the One cannot be fully perceived, and the spirit does not respond. It is not that it does not wish to come, but the one who preserves it is not single-minded, and the one who contemplates it is not discerning. Thus, years of accumulated effort yield no semblance of success. If one can achieve distant resonance with a steadfast heart and no distractions, there is no need for three months of refined contemplation to merge with the One.

The Supreme Lord declared: The Three Primes are the Jade Perfected of the Nine Heavens, the Orthodox Dao of the Upper Perfected. They are the source from which the embryonic root is born and the abode where the Six Harmonies reside. Thus, the Orthodox One Great Dao gives rise to the True Emperor; the Orthodox Dao and Mysterious Perfection generate the Great Spirit. The Five Elders separate and unite, and the myriad transformations swiftly manifest. When the Three Primes dissolve and change, it is from the One that they are born. Therefore, when qi transforms and spreads, the spirit attains numinosity; when the host of perfected beings return to the One, the Mysterious Work is accomplished. This is the ancestral origin of the Orthodox Dao, the root and beginning of primordial qi. When dispersed into the void, white qi merges in obscurity; when nurtured within the form, longevity is eternal.

The method of the Three Ones observes the Dao as complete within the Three Primes. Its Dao is wondrous and marvelous, uniting the numinous scriptures. Heavenly beings, immortals, and perfected sovereigns grasp these treasured divine classics. The first marvel is *The Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Cavern of Perfection True Scripture*; the second marvelous text is the *Feminine One’s Union and Transformation*, titled *The Scripture of Great Possession and Wondrous Mystery*; the third jade formula is *The Cavern of Perfection Mysterious Scripture*, the Three-Five-Seven-Nine, titled *The Supreme Plain and Numinous*. Thus, the Upper One’s Emperor Lord treasures *The Cavern of Perfection True Scripture*; the Middle One’s Cinnabar Sovereign treasures *The Feminine One’s Wondrous Scripture*; the Lower One’s Primordial King secretes *The Plain and Numinous Cavern of Perfection Great Possession Wondrous Scripture*. These Three-Five designations are the utmost essence of the True Dao, the ultimate chapters of the Three Ones, all forbidden formulas of the Jade Clarity and secret texts of the Highest. If you guard the Three Ones and obtain my three scriptures, you will be able to ride the clouds and ascend to the Grand Clarity, gaze into the boundless, and wander and feast in the Purple Court. How subtle it is to explore! Difficult to express in words.

The One from which guarding is born—there the Three Ones are seen. Since you have attained the One, you naturally obtain these scriptures. The method of guarding the Three Ones is the first chapter of the True Writings of the Golden Watchtower Emperor Lord of the Highest Clarity Heaven, the Jade Dao of the Supreme, the ford of gods and immortals, the wondrous formula of the host of perfected beings. If you can guard the One, the One will also guard you; if you can see the One, the One will also see you. The One must rely on the body to stand, and the body must rely on the One to act. In all your movements—whether advancing or retreating, in a thousand affairs or ten thousand matters—always contemplate the One. When eating and drinking, contemplate the One; in joy and delight, contemplate the One; in sorrow and grief, contemplate the One; in illness and disease, contemplate the One; in peril and danger, contemplate the One; when treading through water and fire, contemplate the One; in urgency, contemplate the One. In all actions and glances, contemplation is manifold. Thoughts must be single-minded—without single-mindedness, there is no hope.

The trouble lies in people’s aspirations not being firm; if firm, they cannot endure. They know the name of the One but cannot guard it; if they guard it, they cannot be resolute; if resolute, they cannot endure hardship. Thoughts without end arise from the original heart. Some know the Dao of the One but cannot constantly guard it, so when the Three Ones depart, the Orthodox qi disperses. Those who lose the Orthodox qi allow the old qi to advance, and when the old qi advances, the day of death draws near. Common people who study the Dao often seek superficial embellishments and do not value the True One. Though they may initially have the aspiration, they later falter and fail, all because their resolve is not single-minded and deviant qi enters. The precept of guarding the One is to beware of lack of focus; if focused but not enduring, if enduring but not refined, if refined but not steadfast, if steadfast but not constant—then the Three Ones depart, and the body becomes an empty dwelling. An empty dwelling without a master—how long can misfortune last?

The Supreme Lord declared: Qi congeals into essence, essence resonates into spirit, spirit transforms into the infant, the infant ascends to become the True Person, and the True Person rises to become the Red Child—this is the True One.

The Supreme Lord declared: Heaven has three luminaries—the sun, moon, and stars—which are also the Three Essences, used for long life. Humans have three treasures—the Three Cinnabar Fields—which are also the Three Perfected, used for eternal existence. The *Scripture of Numinous Treasure* states: "Heaven’s essence and Earth’s perfection—let the Three Treasures always abide." This is what it means.

The Supreme Lord declared: Between the eyebrows is the Upper Cinnabar Field. The Crimson Palace of the heart is the Middle Cinnabar Field. Three inches below the navel is the Lower Cinnabar Field. Together, they form the Three Cinnabar Fields. The Red Child resides in the Upper Cinnabar Field Palace, the True Person resides in the Middle Cinnabar Field Palace, and the Infant resides in the Lower Cinnabar Field Palace. One inch inward from between the eyebrows is the Hall of Light; two inches inward is the Cavern Chamber; three inches inward is the Cinnabar Field and Mud-Pill Palace. "Inward" means retreating from the face toward the back of the head. The Cinnabar Field and Mud-Pill Palace is a perfect square, one inch on each side. Visualize purple qi surging to the heavens, with a sun symbol nine inches in diameter within the purple qi, its radiance illuminating ninety thousand miles. My form transforms, appearing and disappearing in an instant, the body forgotten—this too depends on the intent’s preservation. The Upper Prime’s Red Child resides in the Mud-Pill Palace beneath the Flowery Canopy. The Mud-Pill Heavenly Emperor, the Upper One’s Red Child, has the taboo name Mysterious Congealing Heaven, the style Three Primes First, also called Unsurpassed Elder and Elder Historian Hua. His position is the Lord Emperor of the Mud-Pill Heaven, governing the Upper One Palace. To his right is an Imperial Minister, seated in opposition—these are the spirits of my teeth, tongue, and brain, suddenly born through ascension and transformation.

chunks.original_text: 上一为帝卿君，讳肇勒精，字仲玄生，一名起非，一名常扶。 此二人共治泥丸宫中，并裸身无衣，貌如婴孩始生之形。 上一天帝君执上清神虎符，盛以青玉函。 帝卿执《大洞真经》，盛以紫玉函。 坐俱外向，或相向也。 上一帝君口吟曰： 玄玄泥丸，生身保关，太一守籍，上元固神，天常真炁，养形成仙。 毕。 上一所居之宫，内以镇守泥丸、面、目、口、舌、齿、两耳、鼻上所居之宫，毛发之境，外以威震除六天万鬼，凶恶之魔也。 兆身中三魂七魄，五日一来，朝上元帝一，而受化混生混炁之道矣。 心为中丹田，号为绛宫，镇心之中央，正四方面各一寸，朱烟参天，朱烟中有日象，径七寸，外映照七万里，我形变化，倏欻忘身，恍惚在意存之，绛宫心丹田宫，中一元丹皇君处其中。 中一丹皇，讳神运珠，字子南丹，一名生上伯，一名史云拘，位为绛宫丹皇君，治在心宫。 其右有辅皇卿一人，是五藏之精神，合炁结化而忽生也。 入绛宫为辅皇中卿，讳中光坚，字四化灵，一名幽车伯，一名董史华。 此二人共治绛宫心中，并裸形无衣，貌如婴孩始生之形。 丹皇君左手把荧星，存之如鸡子正中央色，右手执雌一高上符，盛以白玉函。 辅皇卿君左手执明月珠，圆三寸，光明洞映。 坐俱外向，或相向也。 丹皇中一君口吟曰：

chunks.original_text: 五藏光明，由炁得生，太上八景，洞观心庭，中一帝皇，保命常宁。 毕。 内以镇守筋骨、五藏、血肉之境，外以震消万邪之不祥，养炁安神，长生久视，飞仙太清，上与天相极。 兆身中三魂七魄，七日一来，朝中一丹皇君，而受分形散化之炁，混合胎神之景也。 脐下三寸号命门丹田宫，下元婴儿居其中，宫正四方面各一寸，白炁冲天，白炁中有日象，圆五寸，外映照五万里，兆形变〔化〕，倏欻忘其形，恍惚在意，存之命门，下一黄庭元王处此宫中。 下元婴儿，讳始明精，字元阳昌，一名婴儿胎，一名伯史原，位为黄庭元王。 其右有保镇弼卿一人，是阴茎精炁，白珠津液之守神，乃结精回烟，升化而生，忽然成人，位为弼卿也。 入在丹田宫弼卿，讳归上明，字谷下玄，一名奉申伯，一名承光生。 此二人共治丹田下元宫中，并裸身无衣，貌如婴孩始生之形。 黄庭元王口吟曰： 玉茎白珠液，结凝成百神，养形五老符，拔籍太上轩，命门不可倾，金液不可愆，回精自满塞，勿漏玉髓泉，生死皆所由，闭之乃神仙。 毕。 下一君左手把太白星，存之如鸡子色正白，右手执《素灵洞玄大有妙经》盛以黄玉函。 弼卿左手执明月珠，圆三寸，映洞下关玉茎之内，右手恒执兆之玉茎，常持之不放。 坐俱外向，或相向也。 内以镇守弼卿，兆下关、四支、津液、骨髓、百窍、肠胃、膀胱之府，外以长生不死，消灾散祸，辟却万邪，绝灭三虫。 三魂七魄，一日三来，朝下黄庭君，受闭精养炁，结炁为仙，从仙得真，从真得玉虚之道也。 存白炁日象之法皆如上，但色同而日大小为异耳。 存念之时，皆以生炁时，坐外任意也。 存三一安其宫，竟周一日，夜半辄复更存耳。 常当烧香左右。 守一之法，至立春之日，夜半之时，正坐东向，服炁九通，咽唾五过。 毕，乃存北斗七星冉冉来下，在我顶上，却向天，以杓柄正向前指东也。 良久，咒曰： 太上玄刚，守一神仙，万魔消灭，身乘玉轩，鬼试不行，度福玉晨，玉清真人，携我在前。 毕。 八节日皆存如此，以辟守一之试校。 有是大洞守一内经者，即为师也。 受经者，则为弟子。 所以崇建本之尽着，明大诚之苦至，期神灵之所崇，托阶级以自始。 所以师友理其外，三一镜其内，帝君欣其宫，赤子悦其宅。 於是紫房秀霄，丹田曜焕，五老降其室，玉华憩其寝，将必神登太霞，信济空洞，体合妙灵，白日升天。 违是道者不全，泄是禁者身残，闻此道者延年，行此道者神仙，可不慎与？ 若本命之日，自可白日存之，唯敬勤耳。 夫自非宿有仙骨玄箓，及金阁玉字，亦自不得闻见真一之妙道也。 或宿世行善，功满五百，或慈心至德，仁及鸟兽，或本命运遇与神合会，诸如此者，得真一也。 若始存守一，未能究三宫之节度，咽炁祝吟之旨者，自可按本文，白日而行之。 初亦宜熟读预习之，於临目存思为易也。 夫泥丸天帝三一君者，乃一神之灵宗，百神之命根，津液之山源，魂精之玉室。 是以胃池体方而受物，脑宫员虚而适真，万穴植立，千孔生烟，德修天地，混同太玄，故名之曰泥丸者，躯形之上神也。 兆唯知吞炁咽唾，鸣齿纳液，而不知此所因者，乃泥丸之流末，脑家之边枝耳。
chunks.translated_text:
The radiance of the five viscera arises from qi and is born,
The Supreme Eight Effulgent Scenes illumine the courtyard of the heart,
The Central One Imperial Sovereign preserves life and ensures enduring peace.
Thus concludes.

Internally, it stabilizes and guards the domains of sinews and bones, the five viscera, blood and flesh;
Externally, it quakes and dispels the inauspiciousness of the myriad evils,
Nurtures qi and pacifies the spirit,
Prolongs life and extends vision,
Soars as an immortal to the Grand Clarity,
And ascends to the ultimate heights of Heaven.

Within your body, the three hun and seven po,
Once every seven days, come to pay court to the Central One Cinnabar Sovereign Lord,
There to receive the qi of dispersed transformation and forms,
And blend with the effulgence of the womb-spirit.

Three inches below the navel is the Gate of Life, the Palace of the Cinnabar Field.
The Lower Primordial Infant dwells within,
The palace is square, each side one inch,
White qi surges to the heavens,
Within the white qi is a solar image, five inches in diameter,
Externally, it illuminates fifty thousand miles.
Your form transforms and suddenly forgets its shape,
Vague and indistinct in perception,
Visualize it at the Gate of Life,
Where the Primordial Yellow Court King of the Lower One resides within this palace.

The Lower Primordial Infant,
Has the taboo name Beginning Radiance Essence,
The style Primordial Yang Prosperity,
Also called Womb Infant,
And Elder Historian Yuan.
He holds the position of Primordial Yellow Court King.

To his right is one Assisting and Stabilizing Minister,
Who is the guardian spirit of the essence-qi of the yang stem, the white pearl, and the fluid,
Formed from the coagulation of essence and the ascent of returning mist,
Suddenly becoming a person,
Holding the position of Assisting Minister.

Entering the Palace of the Cinnabar Field as the Assisting Minister,
His taboo name is Returning to Upper Radiance,
The style Valley’s Lower Mystery,
Also called Elder of Reverent Submission,
And Bearer of Illuminating Life.
These two together govern the Lower Primordial Palace of the Cinnabar Field,
Both naked without clothing, their forms like newborn infants.

The Primordial Yellow Court King chants:
The jade stem and white pearl fluid,
Coagulate and form the hundred spirits,
Nurture the form with the Five Elders’ talisman,
Remove the register from the Supreme Chariot,
The Gate of Life must not incline,
The golden fluid must not err,
Returning essence fills and seals,
Let not the jade marrow spring leak,
Life and death both arise from this,
Seal it and become a divine immortal.
Thus concludes.

The Lower One Lord holds in his left hand the Grand White Star,
Visualizing it as the color at the center of a chicken’s egg, pure white,
And in his right hand the *Scripture of the Wondrous and Profound Primordial Great Possession*, encased in a yellow jade box.
The Assisting Minister holds in his left hand the Bright Moon Pearl,
Three inches in diameter, its luminosity penetrating the inner gate of the jade stem,
And in his right hand constantly grasps your jade stem, never releasing it.
They sit facing outward or toward each other.

Internally, they stabilize and guard the Assisting Minister,
Your lower gate, the four limbs, fluids, marrow, the hundred orifices,
The intestines, stomach, and bladder;
Externally, they ensure longevity and immortality,
Dispel calamities and scatter misfortunes,
Repel the myriad evils,
And eradicate the Three Worms.

The three hun and seven po,
Three times a day, come to pay court to the Lower Yellow Court Lord,
Receiving the method of sealing essence and nurturing qi,
Coagulating qi to become an immortal,
Attaining perfection from immortality,
And from perfection, the Dao of the Jade Void.

The method of visualizing the white qi and solar image is as above,
Only the color is the same, while the size of the sun differs.
When visualizing,
Do so at the time of generative qi,
Sitting facing outward as you wish.

Visualize the Three Ones settling in their palaces,
Completing a full day’s cycle,
Then at midnight, repeat the visualization.
Always burn incense to the left and right.

The method of Guarding the One:
On the day of the Beginning of Spring,
At midnight,
Sit facing east,
Ingest qi nine times,
Swallow saliva five times.
Thus concludes.

Then visualize the Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper slowly descending,
Coming to rest above your crown,
Then facing heaven,
With the handle of the Dipper pointing directly forward toward the east.
After a long while, recite the incantation:
Supreme Mysterious Firmness,
Guard the One and become a divine immortal,
The myriad demons vanish,
The body rides the jade chariot,
Ghostly trials do not proceed,
Cross over to the jade dawn of blessings,
The Jade Clarity Perfected,
Lead me forward.
Thus concludes.

On the days of the eight solar terms, visualize thus,
To repel the trials of Guarding the One.

One who possesses this *Inner Scripture of the Great Cavern on Guarding the One*
Is fit to be a master.
One who receives the scripture
Becomes a disciple.

Thus, the profound establishment of the root is fully expounded,
The utmost sincerity of great integrity is made clear,
Awaiting the veneration of the divine spirits,
And relying on the steps to begin.

Therefore, the master and friend regulate the external,
The Three Ones mirror the internal,
The Imperial Lord delights in his palace,
The Red Child rejoices in his dwelling.

Thereupon, the Purple Chamber shines in the dawn,
The Cinnabar Field glows resplendent,
The Five Elders descend to his chamber,
The Jade Flower rests in his bed,
He will surely ascend to the Grand Rosy Clouds in spirit,
Truly cross the empty cavern,
His body harmonizes with the wondrous numen,
And ascend to heaven in broad daylight.

Those who violate this Dao will not be whole,
Those who leak these prohibitions will suffer bodily harm,
Those who hear of this Dao will prolong their years,
Those who practice this Dao will become divine immortals.
How can one not be cautious?

On the day of your life’s destiny,
You may visualize in broad daylight,
Only with reverence and diligence.

For unless one has the immortal bones and mysterious register of former lives,
Or the golden chamber and jade script,
One naturally cannot hear or see the wondrous Dao of the True One.

Or if in past lives one performed good deeds,
Accumulating merit to five hundred,
Or possessed a heart of utmost compassion,
Extending benevolence to birds and beasts,
Or if one’s destiny in this life coincides and harmonizes with the divine,
In all such cases, one attains the True One.

If, when first practicing Guarding the One,
One cannot fully grasp the regulations of the Three Palaces,
The principles of swallowing qi and reciting incantations,
One may follow the original text and practice in broad daylight.
Initially, it is also fitting to read and prepare thoroughly,
So that when it comes time to visualize, it will be easier.

The Three Ones Lords of the Mud-Pill Palace Heavenly Emperor
Are the numinous origin of the one spirit,
The root of life of the hundred spirits,
The mountain source of fluids,
The jade chamber of the hun-essence.
Thus, the stomach reservoir is square and receives things,
The brain palace is round and empty, fitting for the true,
The myriad cavities stand erect,
The thousand pores generate mist,
Virtue cultivates Heaven and Earth,
Merges with the Grand Mystery,
Hence it is named the Mud-Pill,
The spirit above the bodily form.

You who only know how to swallow qi, swallow saliva,
Click the teeth, and ingest fluid,
Yet do not know the source of this,
Are merely grasping the flowing ends of the Mud-Pill,
The peripheral branches of the brain’s household.

chunks.original_text: 今将告子趣彼守一之秘术，得为上仙之真人。 弟子受者，斋四十五日，毕乃传。 用青缯三十尺，金环三枚，以为洞一之约，勿宣之盟誓矣。 经师受此盟物，以待林泽山栖穷乏，以投行路急病之困，不得妄用赡己之私矣。 违而不奉，死为下鬼，受风刀之考。 父子传授，亦盟如科，传授此经，厚相师友，此天人之法也。 服膺一教，丹心奉一为厚，受教问津为弟子，有经保法者曰师也。 两端有问者，则非守一之才也。 守一之法，依前至八节之日，夜半之时，正坐东向，服炁九通，咽唾五过，毕，乃存北斗七星冉冉来下，在我顶上，却向天，以杓柄正向前，指东阳明、阴精二星在后面，玄冥、真人二星在前面，於是仿髴存念位定。 又思三一之尊君，忽乃变生，共出在斗魁之中，须臾，三卿君复生如三尊，须臾，见六人俱登玄冥，刚行东去，达天关而止，俱向我口。 又存见上元手扶上卿，中元手扶中卿，下元手扶下卿也。 我乃咽炁一通，良久，上元二人从炁中来入我口，上升还泥丸宫。 次咽炁一过，良久，中元二人从炁中来入我口，下回绛官中。 次咽炁一过，良久，下元二人从炁中来入我口，下回还入下丹田中。 存天关星，令去口七尺，令对口前，三一入我三宫中。 都毕，乃精念真一君各安所在。 坐卧思之在心，心有所愿事，心启之，所求者亦心启求之。 存思唯令静寂，静寂寝室，昼日亦可存思。 立春存三一，东向立； 夏存三一，南向立； 秋存三一，西向立； 冬存三一，北向〔立〕，并如立春精思。 至春分日，沐浴清斋，夜半时入室烧香，东向叩齿九通，冥目存我身中三宫三一、三卿及我，合七人，我在中央，俱乘紫炁之烟，共登北斗阳明星。 阳明星者，北斗之东神也。 於是存入星中共坐，吞紫炁三十过。 行之久久，自见阳明星东元太上宫，宫中有青玄小童，授子真光也。 皆悉先存北斗星下，紫炁大如弦，从上直注我前，然后乃存三一也。 存思毕，乃微祝曰： 五方命斗，神致七星，三尊凝化，上招紫灵，六神徘徊，三丹宫城，玄通大帝，下洞黄宁，天真保卫，召引六丁，神仙同浮，乘烟太清，四体坚练，五藏自生。 毕。 至夏至日夜半时，入室烧香，叩齿十二通，南向冥目，存我身中三宫三一、三卿及我，合七人，我在中央也，俱乘紫炁之烟，共登北斗丹元星。 丹元星者，北斗之南神也。 於是存入星中共坐，吞紫炁三十过。 行之久久，自见丹元星南极太上宫，宫中有朱阳灵妃，授子绛书宝衣也。 存思毕，咒如上法。 至秋分日夜半时，入室烧香，平坐西向，叩齿十二通，冥目存我身中三官三一、三卿及我，合七人，我在中央也，俱乘紫炁之烟，共登北斗阴精星。 阴精星者，北斗之西神也。 於是存入星中共坐，吞紫炁三十过。 行之久久，自见阴精星西元太上宫，宫中有白素少女，授子玉童虎书也。 存思毕，咒如上法。 至冬节之日夜半，入室烧香，平坐北向，叩齿十二通，冥目存我身中三宫三一、三卿及我，合七人，我在中央也，俱乘紫炁之烟，共登北斗北极星。 北极星者，北斗之玄神也。 於是存入星中央共坐，各吞紫炁三十过。 行之久久，自见北极星北元太上宫，宫中有玄精真人，授子金书秘字三五顺行。

Now I shall reveal to you the secret art of guarding the One, by which you may become a perfected transcendent of the highest rank. The disciple who receives this must first observe a forty-five-day retreat before transmission. Prepare thirty feet of blue silk and three gold rings as the covenant of the Cavern of the One, a bond sealed by oath not to be divulged. The master who receives these covenant tokens shall hold them in reserve for those dwelling in forests and marshes, for the destitute in mountain hermitages, for travelers in dire straits, or for those afflicted by sudden illness—never to be used for private gain. Should one violate this and fail to uphold it, they shall die and become a lowly ghost, subjected to the trials of the Wind Blade.

Transmission from father to son shall likewise be sealed by this covenant. In transmitting this scripture, treat one another with profound respect as master and friend—this is the law of heaven and humanity. To hold fast to a single teaching, to serve the One with an unwavering heart, is the mark of sincerity. To receive instruction and seek guidance is the way of the disciple. One who preserves the scripture and upholds the method is called a master. Those who waver between two paths are unfit for guarding the One.

The method of guarding the One: On the days of the eight solar nodes, at midnight, sit facing east. Inhale qi nine times, swallow saliva five times, then visualize the Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper descending gently until they hover above your crown, facing heaven, with the handle of the Dipper pointing forward. The Eastern Yang Brightness and Yin Essence stars lie behind, while the Mysterious Darkness and Perfected Person stars stand before. In this manner, fix your visualization and stabilize their positions.

Next, contemplate the Three Ones, the Venerable Lords, who suddenly manifest and emerge within the Dipper’s bowl. After a moment, the Three Ministers likewise appear as three venerable figures. Soon, six figures ascend together onto Mysterious Darkness, then proceed eastward until they reach the Celestial Pass, where all turn toward your mouth.

Then visualize: the Upper Prime supporting the Upper Minister with their hand, the Middle Prime supporting the Middle Minister, and the Lower Prime supporting the Lower Minister. You then inhale qi once. After a long pause, the two figures of the Upper Prime descend from the qi into your mouth and ascend to return to the Mud-Pill Palace. Next, inhale qi once more. After a long pause, the two figures of the Middle Prime descend from the qi into your mouth and return to the Crimson Palace within. Then inhale qi once again. After a long pause, the two figures of the Lower Prime descend from the qi into your mouth and return to the Lower Cinnabar Field.

Visualize the Celestial Pass star positioned seven feet from your mouth, directly before it, as the Three Ones enter your three palaces. When all is complete, focus your mind intently on the True One Lords, each settled in their proper place. Whether sitting or lying down, keep them in your heart. If you have a wish or desire, present it from your heart, and whatever you seek, petition it from your heart. In visualization, strive only for stillness and tranquility. Even in a quiet chamber by day, you may engage in this practice.

At the Spring Equinox, stand facing east while visualizing the Three Ones. At the Summer Solstice, stand facing south; at the Autumn Equinox, stand facing west; and at the Winter Solstice, stand facing north—each time practicing with the same focused contemplation as at the Spring Equinox.

On the day of the Spring Equinox, bathe, purify yourself, and fast. At midnight, enter your chamber, burn incense, face east, and click your teeth nine times. With eyes closed, visualize the Three Ones within your three palaces, the Three Ministers, and yourself—seven figures in all, with you at the center. Together, you all ride the mist of purple qi and ascend to the Yang Brightness star of the Northern Dipper. The Yang Brightness star is the eastern spirit of the Northern Dipper. Visualize entering the star and sitting within it, swallowing purple qi thirty times. With prolonged practice, you will naturally perceive the Eastern Prime Supreme Palace within the Yang Brightness star, where a Green Mystery Youth will bestow upon you the True Light.

First, always visualize the Northern Dipper with a bowstring-like stream of purple qi descending directly before you, and only then proceed to visualize the Three Ones. When the visualization is complete, recite the following incantation softly:

*"The Five Directions summon the Dipper, the gods manifest the Seven Stars.
The Three Venerables congeal and transform, ascending to summon the Purple Spirit.
The Six Gods wander to and fro, the Three Cinnabar Palaces form their citadel.
The Mysterious Passage of the Great Emperor descends to illumine the Yellow Tranquility.
The Heavenly Perfected guard and protect, calling forth the Six Dings.
Immortal and transcendent together ascend, riding the mist to the Great Clarity.
The four limbs become firm and refined, the five viscera spontaneously generate."*

At midnight on the Summer Solstice, enter your chamber, burn incense, click your teeth twelve times, and face south with eyes closed. Visualize the Three Ones within your three palaces, the Three Ministers, and yourself—seven figures in all, with you at the center. Together, you all ride the mist of purple qi and ascend to the Cinnabar Prime star of the Northern Dipper. The Cinnabar Prime star is the southern spirit of the Northern Dipper. Visualize entering the star and sitting within it, swallowing purple qi thirty times. With prolonged practice, you will naturally perceive the Southern Culmen Supreme Palace within the Cinnabar Prime star, where a Vermilion Yang Spirit Maiden will bestow upon you the Crimson Script and the Robe of Treasures. When the visualization is complete, recite the incantation as before.

At midnight on the Autumn Equinox, enter your chamber, burn incense, sit facing west, and click your teeth twelve times. With eyes closed, visualize the Three Ones within your three palaces, the Three Ministers, and yourself—seven figures in all, with you at the center. Together, you all ride the mist of purple qi and ascend to the Yin Essence star of the Northern Dipper. The Yin Essence star is the western spirit of the Northern Dipper. Visualize entering the star and sitting within it, swallowing purple qi thirty times. With prolonged practice, you will naturally perceive the Western Prime Supreme Palace within the Yin Essence star, where a White Simplicity Maiden will bestow upon you the Jade Youth’s Tiger Script. When the visualization is complete, recite the incantation as before.

At midnight on the Winter Solstice, enter your chamber, burn incense, sit facing north, and click your teeth twelve times. With eyes closed, visualize the Three Ones within your three palaces, the Three Ministers, and yourself—seven figures in all, with you at the center. Together, you all ride the mist of purple qi and ascend to the Northern Culmen star of the Northern Dipper. The Northern Culmen star is the mysterious spirit of the Northern Dipper. Visualize entering the center of the star and sitting within it, each swallowing purple qi thirty times. With prolonged practice, you will naturally perceive the Northern Prime Supreme Palace within the Northern Culmen star, where a Dark Essence Perfected Person will bestow upon you the Golden Script and the Three-Five Secret Characters in proper sequence.

chunks.original_text: 存思毕，咒同上法。 存思令三一各安本宫，又叩齿二十四通，仰祝曰： 三尊上真，太玄高神，阳明主春，万童开门，丹元主夏，朱紫合烟，阴精主秋，天威六陈，北极主冬，万邪塞奸，五土庚壬，戊己天关，所摧皆灭，所向莫干，练我七魄，和我三魂，生我五藏，使我得真，飞登上清，浮景七元，长生顺往，啸命千神。 毕。 此四节亦共此一咒，然上达学士，至一节行事，亦并思四节也。 始学者至一节便单行也。 此三元真一妙法，法传上真之士，不传中仙之才也。 有此文而未获修行，朝夕礼拜，烧香供养，三一亦常在子身也，亦为子禳灾辟恶，消却不祥，但不致於云舆耳。 太上告曰：三一之真，易而致感，精思苦念，三月不倦，三一便见真形对言。 人之为学，皆有先志而末怠，初成而中替，悉由有志而不坚，坚而不固，便致不应。 天不欺人，示之以响，地不欺人，应之以影。 响不至，神便远也。 此岂天真不验，由於子身尔。 凡修守一之道，皆当先行帝君素语之咒，以理六府之关，开莹幽机，令赤子定宅，芳芝流溢，神华内生，於修守一，易为真感。 其道秘妙，得者神仙，修行九年，白日升天。 太上三九素语内咒诀文 上清丹灵素语者，皆帝君之素咒，以理九孔，通鲜三宫，故号三九焉。 每以本命之日，及修行众经之时，皆先烧香左右，整束法服，入室平坐，冥目阴咒，百日之中，则炁何神畅，赤子欢悦，真灵下降，面发玉泽，体生奇光，洞澈幽微，与神共言。 如此九年，乘云飞行，游宴太清也。 太帝君素语内咒第一 静室独处，平坐东向，叩齿九通，冥目阴祝曰： 苍元浩灵，少阳先生，九炁还肝，使我魂宁，幽府结华，藏内鲜明，炼容固髓，返白为青，神化内发，景发紫庭，敢有犯试，摧以流铃，上帝玉箓，名上太清。 毕，因闭炁九息，咽液九过止。 天帝君素语内咒第二 正南向，冥目叩齿三通，阴咒曰： 赤庭绛宫，上有高真，三炁归心，是我丹元，腾我净躬，径奏以闻，心固神静，九灵闭关，金真内映，紫烟结云，太微绿字，书名神仙，飞行上清，朝谒帝尊。 毕，闭炁三息，咽液三过止。 南极上元君素语内咒第三 正西向，冥目叩齿七通，阴咒曰： 素元洞虚，天真神卢，七炁守肺，与神同居，保练玉藏，含华秀敷，澄诚明石，游御玄虚，玉字金简，九帝真书，使我飞仙，死名已除，游洞三清，适意所如。 毕，因闭炁七息，咽唾七过止。 太微天帝君素语内咒第四 正向本年命之上，冥目叩齿十二通，阴祝曰： 黄元中帝，本命之神，一炁侍脾，使我得真，宝藏生华，结络紫晨，变景炼容，保命长延，后物而倾，千神来臣，老君玄箓，书名神仙，长生久视，与天同存。 毕，因闭炁一息，咽唾十二过止。 后圣帝君素语内咒第五 正北向，冥目，叩齿五通，阴祝曰： 玄元北极，太上之机，五炁卫肾，龟玉参差，宝华结络，胃藏朗开，着名玉札，年同二仪，上皇太帝，峙然不迷，役使六甲，以致八威。 骖龙驾浮，超然升飞，吐纳神芝，历劫不衰。 毕，闭炁五息，咽唾五过止。 众真素语内咒第六 还东向，存五方之炁，都毕，又咽唾九过，叩齿九通，毕，北向再拜，阴祝曰： 谨白太上太极四真君，请存五方五帝五灵神，刻其绿字，骖驾十天，万祆束炁，众邪绝烟，使某相见，得其语言。
chunks.translated_text:
Upon completing the visualization, recite the incantation as described above. Ensure the Three Ones are settled in their respective palaces, then click your teeth twenty-four times and raise your gaze to intone:

"Three Venerable Supreme Perfected,
Great Mysterious Lofty Spirits,
Yang Brightness governs spring,
Myriad youths open the gates,
Cinnabar Prime governs summer,
Vermilion and purple merge in mist,
Yin Essence governs autumn,
Heavenly Might arrays the six formations,
Northern Culmen governs winter,
Myriad evils and treachery are blocked,
The five earths and the stems geng and ren,
Wu and ji are the Celestial Pass—
All that is shattered shall be destroyed,
All that is faced shall be unassailed.
Refine my seven po,
Harmonize my three hun,
Nurture my five viscera,
That I may attain the True.
Ascend to fly in the Highest Clarity,
Float upon the radiance of the Seven Primes,
Attain long life and proceed in accord,
Command the thousand spirits with a whistle."

This concludes the invocation. These four seasonal visualizations share this single incantation. Advanced practitioners, when performing one seasonal practice, should simultaneously visualize all four. Beginners may perform one season’s practice alone.

This wondrous method of the Three Primes and True One is transmitted only to those of supreme Perfection, not to those of middling immortality. Should one possess this text but not yet engage in its practice, daily reverence, burning of incense, and offerings will still ensure the Three Ones remain within you, averting misfortune, dispelling evil, and dissolving inauspicious omens—though it will not yet bring the cloud chariot.

The Most High declared: The True Ones of the Three Ones are easily moved to respond. With concentrated thought and earnest devotion, unwavering for three months, the Three Ones will manifest in their true forms and converse with you. In all learning, one begins with resolve but later slackens, starts with success but falters midway—all due to having aspiration yet lacking steadfastness, or being steadfast yet not resolute, thus failing to achieve resonance. Heaven does not deceive; it responds with echoes. Earth does not deceive; it answers with shadows. If the echo does not arrive, the spirit has already drifted far. Is this because the celestial truths fail to manifest? It lies within yourself.

In all practices of guarding the One, one must first recite the Plain Incantations of the Thearch Lord to regulate the passes of the six palaces, illumine the obscure mechanisms, settle the Red Child in its abode, and allow fragrant orchids to overflow. When the divine radiance blooms within, the practice of guarding the One will readily evoke true resonance. This Way is profoundly subtle; those who attain it become divine immortals. After nine years of practice, they ascend to heaven in broad daylight.

**The Plain Incantations of the Three Nines from the Most High**
The *Vermilion Numinous Plain Incantations* of the Highest Clarity are the Thearch Lord’s plain invocations, used to regulate the nine apertures and purify the Three Palaces—hence the name "Three Nines." On one’s fateful day or when practicing any scripture, first burn incense on both sides, arrange one’s ritual attire, enter the chamber, sit evenly, close the eyes, and silently recite the incantations. Within a hundred days, the qi will flow unimpeded, the Red Child will rejoice, the true numina will descend, the face will glow with jade-like luster, the body will emit wondrous light, and the subtlest mysteries will become perfectly clear, allowing conversation with the spirits. After nine years of such practice, one will ride the clouds in flight, roaming and feasting in the Great Clarity.

**First Plain Incantation of the Thearch Lord**
In a quiet chamber, sit alone facing east, click the teeth nine times, close the eyes, and silently intone:
"Vast and numinous Azure Prime,
Lesser Yang’s firstborn,
Nine qi return to the liver,
Calming my hun.
The obscure palace binds its blossoms,
The inner treasury shines bright.
Refine my countenance, strengthen my marrow,
Reverse white to azure.
The divine transformation arises within,
Radiance blooms in the Purple Court.
Should any dare to challenge,
Crush them with the Flowing Bell.
The Jade Register of the Thearch,
My name ascends to the Great Clarity."
Conclude by holding the breath for nine cycles and swallowing saliva nine times.

**Second Plain Incantation of the Heavenly Thearch Lord**
Face due south, close the eyes, click the teeth three times, and silently intone:
"Vermilion Court and Crimson Palace,
Above dwell the lofty Perfected.
Three qi return to the heart,
This is my Cinnabar Prime.
Lift my pure body,
Ascend directly to report.
The heart is firm, the spirit still,
The Nine Numinous seal the passes.
Golden Perfection shines within,
Purple mist gathers as clouds.
The Jade Characters of the Great Subtlety
Inscribe my name as divine immortal.
Fly to ascend to the Highest Clarity,
To pay homage to the August Honored One."
Conclude by holding the breath for three cycles and swallowing saliva three times.

**Third Plain Incantation of the Southern Culmen Supreme Prime Lord**
Face due west, close the eyes, click the teeth seven times, and silently intone:
"Primal Simplicity pervades the void,
Heavenly Perfected, Spirit of Lu.
Seven qi guard the lungs,
Abiding with the spirit.
Refine and protect the Jade Treasury,
Containing blossoms in full bloom.
Clarify sincerity, bright as stone,
Roam and ascend the mysterious void.
Jade script and golden tablets,
The Nine Thearchs’ true writings.
Let me fly as an immortal,
My name of death already erased.
Roam the Three Clarities,
Freely as I desire."
Conclude by holding the breath for seven cycles and swallowing saliva seven times.

**Fourth Plain Incantation of the Thearch Lord of the Great Subtlety**
Face the direction corresponding to the current year’s fate, close the eyes, click the teeth twelve times, and silently intone:
"Yellow Prime, Central Thearch,
Spirit of my fateful destiny,
One qi attends the spleen,
That I may attain the True.
The precious treasury blooms,
Binding the network of Purple Dawn.
Transform the radiance, refine the countenance,
Preserve life and prolong existence.
Tilt after all things,
A thousand spirits come to serve.
The Mysterious Register of the Venerable Lord
Inscribes my name as divine immortal.
Long life and enduring vision,
Abiding with heaven."
Conclude by holding the breath for one cycle and swallowing saliva twelve times.

**Fifth Plain Incantation of the Later Sage Thearch Lord**
Face due north, close the eyes, click the teeth five times, and silently intone:
"Mysterious Prime of the Northern Culmen,
Mechanism of the Most High,
Five qi defend the kidneys,
Tortoise and jade intermingle.
Precious blossoms bind the network,
The stomach treasury shines open.
Inscribe my name on the Jade Tablet,
My years equal the Two Modes.
The Supreme Thearch of the Highest August,
Unyielding and unconfused,
Command the Six Jia,
Summon the Eight Might.
Harness dragons to drive the floating,
Transcend and ascend in flight.
Exhale and inhale divine orchids,
Enduring through kalpas without decline."
Conclude by holding the breath for five cycles and swallowing saliva five times.

**Sixth Plain Incantation of the Multitude of Perfected**
Return to face east, visualize the qi of the five directions, complete the sequence, then swallow saliva nine times and click the teeth nine times. Conclude by facing north, bowing twice, and silently intoning:
"Reverently address the Four True Lords of the Supreme Ultimate and Great Culmen: I request the presence of the Five Thearchs, Five Numinous Spirits of the Five Directions, to inscribe their jade characters, harness the ten heavens, bind the myriad pernicious qi, and sever the smoke of all demons. Let me meet them and receive their words."
